FORM.TITLE: Registration Form
FORM.SUB_TITLE: Please enter your Data into the form to register

ERROR.EMAIL_ALREADY_IN_USE: The specified e-mail address is already in use

AFTER_REGISTRATION.TITLE: Registration was successful
AFTER_REGISTRATION.CONTENT: An e-mail has been sent to the entered e-mail address. Please follow the instructions in the e-mail to verify your account

START.TITLE: Your registration will be validated
START.SUB_TITLE: Please be patient for a moment
START.CONTENT: Your registration will be validated and your account will be created.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Your registration was successful
SUCCESS.SUB_TITLE: Your e-mail address has been confirmed
SUCCESS.CONTENT: Your account has been created. You can now log in with your verified e-mail address.

FAILED.TITLE: Your registration was unsuccessful
FAILED.SUB_TITLE: We could not confirm your e-mail address
FAILED.CONTENT: Please start the registration process again. Note that the confirmation e-mail can expire.
